-- CREATE DATABASE EDW;
USE EDW;
-- CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [STG_EDS2] WITH
-- (
-- 	LOCATION = 'https://synstg.blob.core.windows.net/syn-fs/delta/gold/'
-- );

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'DimCustomer',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'STG_EDS2',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
